JOB DESCRIPTION:
Software Developer 

Number of positions : Multiple 

Position Duties: Analyze and develop computer programs. Assist with design,  analysis,  maintenance,  documentation and testing of software. Code,  debug,  test and document routing application programs. Install and test routing software packages. Develop and write computer programs to store,  locate,  and retrieve specific documents,  data and information. 

Education & Experience Requirements: Candidate must have bachelors in Computer (Science/ Engineering/ Applications),  MIS,  Engineering (Any Branch) or related field or foreign equivalent and at least 5 years of progressive work experience in job offered/ related occupation using following technical skills: Java/ J2EE (JSP,  Servlet,  EJB,  JNDI,  JDBC,  JMS),  SQL,  PL/ SQL,  UML,  XML,  HTML,  Java Script,  Web Logic,  Apache Tomcat,  Web Methods IS,  Web Sphere SOAP,  REST,  Axis2,  GLUE. Relational databases: Oracle. Tools: Eclipse,  My Eclipse,  Toad,  Rational Rose.
